Ingredients.4: 1 (12 pound) whole turkey, neck and giblets reserved

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place onion, celery, and carrot in a large, shallow roasting pan.

Directions.3: Place turkey, breast-side up, on top of vegetables in the roasting pan. Pat outside and inside of turkey dry with paper towels.

Directions.4: Combine salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper in a small bowl. Season inside of turkey with about 1/3 of the salt mixture. Fold wing tips under bird.

Directions.5: Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium heat until edges turn golden, about 2 minutes. Add rosemary and sage; cook and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute.

Directions.6: Place rosemary and sage inside cavity of turkey; reserve melted butter. Tie turkey legs together with twine.

Directions.7: Brush melted butter over turkey. Season with the remaining salt mixture.

Directions.8: Bake turkey, uncovered, in the preheated oven until no longer pink at the bone and juices run clear, about 3 hours. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the thigh, near the bone should read 180 degrees F (82 degrees C).

Directions.9: Remove turkey from the oven and allow to rest in a warm area for 10 to 15 minutes before slicing.
